Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Research and brainstorm potential art styles for the game (e.g., stylized vs. realistic).
Meet with @cart-1 @3dmod-1 @3dmod-2 to discuss initial thoughts on art style and gather input from the concept and 3D modeling teams.
Create a shared document to compile references and mood boards for inspiration. Start collecting images and examples from various sources.
Review technical constraints with @lpro-1 @beng-1 to understand limitations like polygon count and texture resolution.
Refine the mood board and share it with the team for feedback. Update the document based on initial reactions.
Experiment with small art style tests in-engine to see how different styles perform technically.
Discuss findings with @cart-1 @3dmod-1 @3dmod-2 and adjust the direction if needed.
Wrap up the day by documenting the progress and preparing for tomorrow's tasks.
